documentation.text: @notice The reward token DAPP's value is 100$
@notice It represents 0.001, since we only use integer numbers. This will give users 0.1% reward for each staked token / H
@notice Only a spcific ERC-20 token is allowed to be staked in this contract
@notice Chainlink price feed to chack the value of our staked token in dollars (DAI/USD)
@notice Stores all current stakers addresses
@notice uniqueStaker is used to keep track of the INDEX for the stakers in the stakers array
@notice Staked event is triggered whenever a user stakes tokens, address is indexed to make it filterable
@notice Unstaked event is triggered whenever a user unstakes tokens, address is indexed to make it filterable

devdoc.author: Adrien Guidis

getTokenDollarValue().details: The price calcultation is based the pair DAI/USD

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
